    • Method Detail

      • generateToken

        public java.lang.String generateToken()
        Generates the token from Keystone service of OpenStack. Pseudo Code 1. Load the auth details of keystone from the configuration object 2. Create a RESTLET client and set the header info 3. Send a POST request to the Keystone client 4. Extract the token info from the response header
        Returns:
